ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:25:43 [Issue ID 4000-541456] urn:comicvine:4000-541456 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/541456
ComicInfo.Summary: Heavenside has seen better days. Bodies are starting to pile up, more are starting to get sick, and all the things people have always taken for granted are starting to not work. The promises of the future may all have been broken, but the Doktor has stayed true to his word-- it's getting so the only constant in people's lives is the nightly Doktor Sleepless broadcast. And although that may be just how he wants it, that's what frightens Sing the most. But with everyone listening intently to the Doktor's every word, there may be no one left to listen to what she has to say..
ComicInfo.Tags: Commissioner Stoker,Doktor Sleepless [John Reinhardt],Nurse Igor,Sing Watson
ComicInfo.Title: Superconnected Superinsane
